 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנֶה‎</span> (less often <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמוֺנֶה‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנָה‎</span><sub>109</sub> **noun masculine and feminine** ==eight== (on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ֶ֯‎</span> compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 20, 200 and</sup> (against him) Philippi<sup>BAS ii. 364</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">,<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֿמני(תׅ‎</span> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>chr 47, 122</sup> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ZMG xxxvii (1883), 369 f.</sup>, 375; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּמָנֵי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּמַנְיָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תמונא‎</span>, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תמניא‎</span>, [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>386</sup>; Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שמן‎</span> Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"><img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> on Assyrian equivalent see [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>§ 75</sup>); — 

**masculine** (c. **noun feminine**) always absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנֶה‎</span> [[Judg.3.8|Judg 3:8]] + 40:t.; **feminine** (c. **noun masculine**) absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנָה‎</span> [[1Sam.17.12|1Sam 17:12]] + 34 t., construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנַת‎</span> [[Num.2.24|Num 2:24]] + 3 t. (cases of 8 + 10 = 18 are additional, see below); plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנִים‎</span>, 80, see below: — 

**1.** without other number: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנֶה‎</span> cardinal, before plural noun [[Judg.3|Judg 3]]:s [[1Kgs.7.10|1Kgs 7:10]] + 8 t.; before singular noun <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָךְ‎</span> [[1Kgs.8.17|1Kgs 8:17]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]]; [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] plural) [[1Kgs.22.1|1Kgs 22:1]] after plural noun [[Ezek.40.31|Ezek 40:31]] ordinal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשְׁנַת שׁ‎</span> [[2Kgs.24.12|2Kgs 24:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנִים לְ‎</span> [[2Chr.34.3|2Chr 34:3]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמנָה‎</span> cardinal, before plural noun [[1Sam.17.12|1Sam 17:12]] + 3 t., + (noun omitted) [[Jer.14.15|Jer 14:15]] + 2 t., also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֵלֶּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Gen.22.23|Gen 22:23]] ***these*** 8 and, as round number, [[Mic.5.4|Mic 5:4]] 7 ***and*** 8 (i.e. plenty); after plural noun [[Num.29.29|Num 29:29]]; [[2Chr.29.17|2Chr 29:17]] ordinal, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּיוֺם שׁ‎</span> v[[2Chr.29.17|2Chr 29:17]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** feminine construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנַת יָמִים‎</span> [[Gen.17.12|Gen 17:12]]; [[Gen.21.4|Gen 21:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַבָּקָר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Num.7.8|Num 7:8]]. 

**2.** 8 + 10 = 8: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** with **noun feminine** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנֶה עֶשְׂרֵה‎</span>, cardinal: before singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָךְ‎</span> [[Judg.3.14|Judg 3:14]] + 2 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַמָּה‎</span> [[1Kgs.7.15|1Kgs 7:15]] + 2 t.; after plural noun [[1Chr.26.9|1Chr 26:9]]; [[2Chr.11.21|2Chr 11:21]] noun omitted [[Ezra.8.18|Ezra 8:18]]; [[Neh.7.11|Neh 7:11]] ordinal, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשְׁנַת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.15.1|1Kgs 15:1]] + 4 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָח לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשׁ‎</span> [[2Kgs.22.3|2Kgs 22:3]] + 2 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָה לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשָּׁנָה שׁ‎</span> [[Jer.32.1|Jer 32:1]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** with **noun masculine** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנָח עָשָׂר‎</span> cardinal: before singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלֶף‎</span> [[Judg.20.44|Judg 20:44]] + 4 t. + [[Ps.60.2|Ps 60:2]] (title), so read for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנֵים ע‎</span>, compare [[2Sam.8.13|2Sam 8:13]] = [[1Chr.18.12|1Chr 18:12]] before plural [[Ezra.8.9|Ezra 8:9]] noun omitted [[Gen.14.14|Gen 14:14]] ordinal, noun omitted [[1Chr.24.15|1Chr 24:15]]; [[1Chr.25.15|1Chr 25:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנַת עָשָׂר אֶלֶף‎</span> [[Judg.20.25|Judg 20:25]]. 

**3.** with ==other numerals:== 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנֶח מֵאוֺת‎</span> [[2Sam.23.8|2Sam 23:8]] (so read also \|\| [[1Chr.11.11|1Chr 11:11]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Benz|Benz]], compare [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and others), + 16 t. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנָח אֶלֶף‎</span> [[1Chr.12.36|1Chr 12:36]] (35 [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]]), [[1Chr.23.3|1Chr 23:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁמֹנִת אֲלָפִים‎</span> [[Num.2.24|Num 2:24]] + 3 t. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span>, cardinal, after tens [[1Sam.4.15|1Sam 4:15]] + 20 t.; before ten, only <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעֶשְׂרים בָּאַמָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁ‎</span> [[Exod.26.2|Exod 26:2]]; [[Exod.36.9|Exod 36:9]] ordinal, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בִּשְׁנַת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנָח לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלשִׁים וּשׁ‎</span> [[1Kgs.16.29|1Kgs 16:29]]; [[2Kgs.15.8|2Kgs 15:8]].
